answers.answer: Hi!Vaginal itching may be due to chemical irritants (such as detergents, fabric softeners, feminine sprays, ointments, creams, douches, and contraceptive foams or jellies), drop in estrogen, pin worms and stress. Vaginal yeast infection which can be brought about by antibiotics, birth control pills, pregnancy, menstruation (just as in yur case—the itch came after periods), condom use, sexual intercourse, diabetes, and a weakened immune system.Also, vaginitis can be caused by other infections, including sexually transmitted diseases. Have this checked by your gynecologist for proper evaluation. Diagnostic tests including culture and microscopic exam of vaginal discharge, PAP smear and urine and blood studies (including hormone levels) may be done to help with the diagnosis. Take care!

question: During my last menstrual cycle I had a clot stuck in my vaginal passage for 2 days, after it came out my menstrual cycle stopped and restarted in 3 days and lasted for about 2 days. since then I have been itching everyday and that never happened before.
title: Menstrual cycle trouble
